title: President Donald J. Trump is Addressing Unfair Trade Practices That Threaten to Harm Our National Security – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Economy & Jobs	

Issued on:
March 8, 2018
 Economic vitality, growth, and prosperity at home is absolutely necessary for American power and influence abroad.
						President Donald J. Trump					COUNTERING TRADE PRACTICES THAT UNDERMINE NATIONAL SECURITY: President Donald J. Trump is addressing global overcapacity and unfair trade practices in the steel and aluminum industries by putting in place a 25 percent tariff on steel imports and 10 percent tariff on aluminum imports.PROTECTING INDUSTRIES VITAL TO NATIONAL SECURITY: The tariffs imposed by President Trump will address steel and aluminum import quantities and circumstances that threaten to impair our national security.CONSISTENT ACTION: President Trump’s action to protect American steel and aluminum industries is consistent with his Administration’s policies and practices.
